entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
